identification.name: roc.film
identification.description: RPW FILe Maker (FILM): Plugin to make RPW L0, L1 and HK data files

tasks.name: raw_to_l0
tasks.description: Create RPW L0 files from RawData object

l0_file.name: RPW L0 data
l0_file.description: Contains RPW packets, unpacked and decompressed from a given day

tasks.name: l0_to_l1_surv
tasks.description: Create RPW L1 survey data files

l1_surv_rswf.name: SOLO RPW TDS L1 survey mode regular snapshot waveform data
l1_surv_rswf.description: Contains RPW TDS L1 RSWF science data in survey mode, time-tagged
mods: 2020-10-23 -- V1.6.1 -- First release: Initial version

2021-02-16 -- V1.8.4 -- Second release: OBS_ID attribute is now correctly set | MODS is now used for data release log and SKELETON_MODS for CDF skeleton change log | Fix attribute inconsistencies | Resize WF data array correctly
2024-12-06 -- V1.14.0 -- Make CDF compliant with SolO metadata standards 2.6 and RCS ICD 1.7

tasks.name: l0_to_hk
tasks.description: Create RPW HK CDF daily files for SOLO

hk_dbs.name: SOLO RPW HK DBS data
hk_dbs.description: Contains RPW DBS HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_das.name: SOLO RPW HK DAS data
hk_das.description: Contains RPW DAS HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_das_stat.name: SOLO RPW HK DAS statistic data
hk_das_stat.description: Contains RPW DAS STATISTIC HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_pdu.name: SOLO RPW HK PDU data
hk_pdu.description: Contains RPW PDU HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_bia.name: SOLO RPW HK BIA data
hk_bia.description: Contains RPW BIA HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_thr.name: SOLO RPW HK THR data
hk_thr.description: Contains RPW THR HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_tds.name: SOLO RPW HK TDS data
hk_tds.description: Contains RPW TDS HK parameters, time-tagged

hk_lfr.name: SOLO RPW HK LFR data
hk_lfr.description: Contains RPW LFR HK parameters, time-tagged

tasks.name: l0_to_hk_dump
tasks.description: Create RPW HK CDF 'dump' files for SOLO

hk_das_dump.name: SOLO RPW HK DAS DUMP data
hk_das_dump.description: Contains RPW DAS HK dump parameters, time-tagged

tasks.name: dds_to_l0
tasks.description: Parse input MOC DDS response XML files into L0 file straightly (not for nominal use).

tasks.name: set_l0_utc
tasks.description: Set packet UTC times of the input RPW L0 file with SPICE kernels.

tasks.name: l0_to_daily_report
tasks.description: Create SOLO RPW summary daily reports

rpw_event_report.name: SOLO RPW event report file
rpw_event_report.description: file containing list of events reported by the DPU

rpw_status_report.name: SOLO RPW event report file
rpw_status_report.description: file containing list of events reported by the DPU

tasks.name: rocdb_to_bia_sweep_report
tasks.description: Create SOLO RPW summary bias sweep history report

bia_sweep_report.name: SOLO RPW Bias sweep history report file
bia_sweep_report.description: file containing list of Bias sweeps operated on-board

tasks.name: db_to_anc_bia_sweep_table
tasks.description: Create CSV file containing SOLO RPW bias sweep table data from ROC database

anc_bia_sweep_table.name: SOLO RPW Bias sweep table CSV file
anc_bia_sweep_table.description: file containing list of Bias sweeps tables loaded on-board

tasks.name: move_to_products_dir
tasks.description: Move output file folder into a different directory.

tasks.name: move_failed_files
tasks.description: Move output file tagged as failed into a /failed sub-directory.

tasks.name: check_dds
tasks.description: Loading input SolO MOC DDS file(s) found in a given input folder

tasks.name: parse_dds_xml
tasks.description: Parse and store input MOC DDS TmRaw or TcReport response XML file(s) into dictionary

dds_xml.description: Solar Orbiter MOC EDDS TmRaw or TcReport response XML

tasks.name: merge_tmraw
tasks.description: Merge input TmRaw Packet XML tags into daily XML files

tasks.name: merge_tcreport
tasks.description: Merge input TcReport XML tags into daily XML files

tasks.name: make_daily_tm
tasks.description: Produce daily XML files from TmRaw data

tasks.name: cat_solo_hk
tasks.description: Task to concatenate and sort by ascending time a list of ParamSampleListElement XML element containing SOLO HK parameters. ParamSampleListElement XML elements are loaded from a set of input SOLO EDDS Param XML files

tasks.name: copy_processed_dds
tasks.description: Copy successfully processed DDS files into a target directory.

tasks.name: copy_failed_dds
tasks.description: Copy failed DDS files into a target directory.

tasks.name: cdf_post_pro
tasks.description: Perform post-processing on RPW CDF files

tasks.name: export_solo_hee_coord
tasks.description: Produce CSV file with SolO HEE coordinates
